You are my husband. In consideration of the love and affection I have for you, I hereby grant you, without any expectation of any reward, a certain amount of property free of charge, as set out in the Schedule below, all that I have acquired through my ancestors and which have been registered in my name in the accounts of the Sri Gram Panchayat and which I have had full right to enjoy from the date of the date of the transfer of ownership to you. I hereby transfer to you, free of charge, a property worth Rs. 7,46,000/- literally seven lakh forty-six thousand rupees, comprising a vacant land measuring 203.90 sq.m. and its newly constructed R.C.C. foundation, adjacent to the house bearing number 4-232/1 in the village of Neeladriraopet, Taluk Survey No. 128, Ragampet suburb, along with all the leasehold and permanent rights and interests I have in it, and I hereby take full possession of the said property on this very day. From now on, you shall be the full rightful owners and shall pay all the Panchayat taxes due to the Government and shall enjoy the happiness of that Chandratarakam freely with all the rights of donation and sale, as per your wish, for your children and grandchildren. Therefore, I will remove all the feudal encumbrances, whatever they may be, at my own expense, and will continue to implement this settlement property under you without any hindrance. I assure you that the said property is an indisputable property, free from any mortgages, deeds, guarantees, etc., to whom others have previously committed any illegal acts, and I hereby issue this settlement deed in your name. This settlement property is hereby registered in the accounts of the Shri Panchayat in your name. This property is not assigned under the 9/77 Act.

This document is a copy of the title deeds, tax receipts and government I/We have furnished all the necessary particulars such as my/our identity documents issued by them to the undersigned. I/We hereby certify that the property in this document has not been transferred/alienated/registered to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me/us, and I/We hereby register this document in the name of the undersigned.
The Sub-Registrar, his/her office staff and the draftsman shall not have any relation or responsibility in connection with this document which is being registered today. The document has been prepared and registered only on the basis of the particulars furnished by me/us.
I hereby declare that I/We may, if necessary, issue any amendment/agreement/supplementary document(s) to this document without delay or compensation to the undersigned, at their request. I/We hereby declare that all the information provided herein is true and correct and that I/We shall be fully responsible for all legal actions and transactions related to such matters if it is found out in the future that there are any untruths in the information provided herein. Declaration of the undersigned Darulla Lowalaxmi Having personally examined the title deeds, encumbrance certificate and identity documents of the undersigned and having verified the same to be true, I/We hereby register this deed from the undersigned. Therefore, I/We hereby declare that I/We shall be fully responsible for all transactions relating to this property. Neither the Sub-Registrar, his/her office staff nor the scribe who prepared the draft shall have any connection or liability in connection with this deed, which is being registered today. This document has been prepared and registration is taking place with the details provided by me/us.
Daraballa Satthibabu
Sattibabu Nani

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 9587 of 2025, dated 27/Dec/2025, executed by Dharaballa Lova Lakshmi, in favour of her Husband, Dharaballa Sattibabu, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 203.90 Sq.Yds, located nearby house number 4-232/1, comprised in survey number 128, situated in Neeladriraopet Village & Gram Panchayat, Gandepalli Mandal, erstwhile East Godavari District, now within the District of Kakinada registered at sub-registrar office Prathipadu, is bounded as follows: North by: Site of Pandi Satyavati, 34.11 Sq. Ft South by: Site of Dharaballa Atccharao, 34.11 Sq. Ft East by: Panchayat Cement Road 53.8 Sq. Ft West by: Tiled House of Nakka Venkat Rao 53.8 Sq. Ft
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
